name: Bahamut2-Come on,Fight
description:
warn! The English version of this game uses machine translation, so the language quality is relatively poor. If you are concerned, please do not buy it.

Have you heard of parallel time and space?
This story takes place in another parallel time and space of " Bahamut 2-Bride of the Dragon".
A woman named Celia who lived for more than 3,000 years, she wanted to find her husband Bahamut, but found the sealed Bahamut in Kreer's body. Clear has been trained to be very powerful, so Celia plans to take Clear as a disciple and carry out inhumane training?!
And since everyone around Clear knows that he has Bahamut in his body (only Clear himself does not know it), they exclude him, but make Clear mistakenly think that everyone is afraid of his strength, which makes his personality become aggressive Arrogant, looking down on anyone, until I met Celia...
So... what kind of sparks will happen between a crooked Kreer and a psychopath(?!) Celia who has lived too long?
The same characters have different personalities, and the same story begins with different endings. You are welcome to experience it.
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　

Game Features

  • Roguelike battles, each battle will restart to choose a new job, and carry out a different job transfer route.
  • Enemies will continue to appear during the battle, and it is no longer a trigger battle for stepping on landmines.
  • There are more than 500 kinds of skills. In addition to upgrading and learning skills, you can also combine new skills by combining skills.
  • Use shortcut keys to set common skills, and activate skills with one key in battle.
  • Fight with your pet companions, there are more than 30 kinds of pets for you to choose.
  • A variety of part-time small games to play different operating games.
  • The new casino is online, let's see if you get rich overnight or never.
  • The funny interaction with the master will let you have unexpected plot direction.
  • There is no RPG-style map exploration, but AVG-style graphic dialogue.
